document_data.name: Ankramir
document_data.mainbody: The '''Principality of Ankramir''' was the southwestern [[wikipedia:en:Principality|principality]] of [[Tethyr]].<ref name=LoI1:T-map>
document_data.Geography:
Ankramir included the [[wikipedia:en:Duchy|duchies]] of [[Kamlann]], the [[Purple Marches]], and [[Ankaram]],<ref name=LoI1:T-p1> and was the location of Tethyr's former capital and largest city, [[Zazesspur]].<ref name=LoI1:T-p68/>

The region was sparsely populated, relative to other areas of Tethyr. In cultural feel, it was akin to [[Calimshan]], which bordered it to the south.<ref name=LoI1:T-p68/>
document_data.Government: Formally, this principality was under the authority of Princess [[Cyriana Rhindaun]] in [[1370 DR]], who was the daughter of Queen [[Zaranda Star|Zaranda Star Rhindaun]] and her consort King [[Haedrak Rhindaun III]]. Since the princess was a young child at that time, the ruling of the principality was handled by Cyriana's regent, [[Vajra Valmeyjar]], the Duchess of Ankaram.<ref name=LoI1:T-p68/>
